text: Sochi (Russuan:Со́чи) is a city in Russia on the Black Sea coast. It is in Krasnodar Krai, a Russian federal subject. The 2014 Winter Olympics and the 2014 Winter Paralympics were played there. The Sochi Olympic Stadium was also used to host 2018 FIFA World Cup football matches. Sochi is also a popular health resort. It is one of very few places in Russia with a humid subtropical climate (Cfa in the Köppen climate classification). == Other websites == *Official site of XXII Olympic Winter Games and XI Paralympic Winter Games of 2014 in Sochi Category:Olympic cities Category:Port cities and towns of the Black Sea
title: Sochi
